code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Form.css';import logo from'./assets/logo.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const onSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch('https://referee-scheduler-backend.onrender.com/api/auth/login',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});if(response.ok){navigate('/dashboard');}else{const data=await response.json();console.error('Login failed:',data);}}catch(error){console.error('Login error:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Logo",className:"form-logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true,autoComplete:"email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true,autoComplete:"current-password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Log In"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Don't have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"form-toggle",onClick:()=>navigate('/signup'),children:"Sign up"})]})]});}export default Login;
